content.description: From Char Fetterolf's "Haycock Mountain Bouldering" guidebook:   "Start with your choice of holds and climb the vertical seams.  Tough to get started."
content.location: Between "Bump and Drag" and the corner route "V0."

content.description: Start on good edges and climb 2 moves up before the holds stop, slap for the lip and find the good jug and top out.  The slopers to the right on the arete are off.  A V0 variation to this problem allows use of the arete.
content.location: The first route on the right hand side of the backside of the main boulder in the teddy bear area.

content.description: Teddy Bear Picnic is the leftward angling crack on the backside of the teddy bear area main boulder.  Begin the problem standing on the low boulder to gain a good finger lock and follow the crack using jams and small edges for feet to a slopey top out.
content.location: The leftward angling crack on the backside of the teddy bear area main boulder.

content.description: Start on the Into The Picnic traverse holds between Teddy Bear's Picnic and Tit Toss and dyno up to a sharp edge below the lip, or skip it and go straight to the top.
A technical climb, start on a sidepull and a good crimp under the perched boulder and move right on small edges.  Reach a good jam and position your feet higher to reach positive holds at the lip.
content.location: On the left hand side of the main boulder in the teddy bear area, the route starts under the perched boulder.

content.description: A great link up of Tit Toss and Teddy Bear's Picnic. Start on Tit Toss and traverse left on good holds until you have to make a big reach to gain access to Teddy Bear's Picnic. Top out Teddy Bear's Picnic.
content.protection:
1-2 pads.  

  there is a slight pit underneath Teddy Bears Picnic and during your traverse, you'll have to cross over a few jagged rocks. A good spotter could help

content.description: Traverse the slopey lip to top.
content.location: To the right of Limp Dick on Teddy Bear boulder between Bump and Drag and Jeff's Route

content.description: Sit down start with hands on either side of the block, slap your way up the block to easier ground and follow the left angling crack to top out.
content.location: On the front side of the main boulder at the teddy bear area, to the left of limp dick.

content.description: There is a phallic looking over hanging rock feature called Limp Dick accordingly on the front side; welcome to Teddy Bear boulder.
